original_text: But Israel's people tried to find a law that would make them right with God. But they failed to become right with God. But Israel's people tried to find a law that would make them right with God. But they failed to become right with God. But Israel's people tried to find a law that would make them right with God. But they failed to become right with God. But Israel's people tried to find a law that would make them right with God. But they failed to become right with God. But Israel's people tried to find a law that would make them right with God. But they failed to become right with God.
korean_text: 의의 법을 따라간 이스라엘은 율법에 이르지 못하였으니

sentences.original_text: But Israel's people tried to find a law
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이스라엘 백성은 율법을 찾으려고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: that would make them right with God
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그들을 하나님과 올바르게 만들 것이라고

sentences.original_text: But they failed to become right with God
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 하나님과 올바르게 되지 못했습니다
